duties_responsibilities.duty: Booking and managing travel arrangements for clients, including hotel, rental car, and excursions
Creating and coordinating all aspects of travel arrangements including, but not limited to, travel bookings, itineraries, and itinerary changes
Managing client accounts in our Travel Booking System
Preparing weekly reports on travel activity by using Microsoft Excel or other Microsoft Word documents
Preparing airline tickets and boarding passes by using online booking sites

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3 years of professional experience working in a travel agency environment
